field.label: Enable Extension
field.comment: Enables the syncing of Magento orders to Signifyd. Enable this setting ONLY AFTER you've completed the configuration of the plugin.

field.label: Signifyd API Key
field.comment: Your API key can be found on the settings page in the Signifyd console. Don't have an account? Contact us

field.label: Restricted Payment Methods
field.comment: Orders placed using selected payment methods will be excluded from being sent to Signifyd. These orders will not be created in Signifyd and the extension will not interfere with the order workflow i.e. place the order on hold or capture the payment.

field.label: Restricted Order States
field.comment: Orders with these states will be excluded from being sent to Signifyd. E.g. by default, the extension restricts any action on payment_review state, to ensure the extension does not interfere with the payment workflow.
